title: Remember Lot's Wife (Christine Caine)
description:
Don’t settle for stuck.

In this sermon, Christine Caine reminds us that we have a hope that can not be shaken — and His name is Jesus.

If you’ve just made a decision for Christ, please respond HERE: http://ele.vc/tIepfr 

To support this ministry and help us continue to reach people all around the world click here: http://www.elevationchurch.org/giving/

Scripture References:

Luke 17, verses 20-37

Genesis 13, verses 12-13

Ezekiel 16, verses 49-50

Genesis 19, verse 17

Genesis 19, verse 26

Luke 24, verse 21

Hebrews 6, verse 19

Hebrews 2, verse 1

Zechariah 9, verse 12

Philippians 3, verses 13-14
